model.Conference

    • Uses of Conference in control

      Methods in control that return Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Conference ConferenceControl.getConferenceByID(int theKey)
      Fetches a single Conference object by it's unique ID.
      Methods in control that return types with arguments of type Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Conference> ConferenceControl.getConferences()
      This method returns a List of ALL conferences within the database.
      static java.util.List<Conference> ConferenceControl.getConferences(User theUser)
      Builds and returns a List of the Conference objects that only include those Conferences that the User has a recorded AccessLevel for.
      static java.util.List<Conference> ConferenceControl.getConferences(User theUser, AccessLevel theAccess)
      Builds and returns a List of the Conference objects that only include those Conferences that the User has the specific AccessLevel for.
      static java.util.List<Conference> ConferenceControl.searchConferences(java.lang.String searchString)
      Returns a List of Conferences that have the given String as part of their name field.
      Methods in control with parameters of type Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int ConferenceControl.createConference(Conference theConference)
      Use this method to submit a freshly created conference to the database and retrieve its unique ID number.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getAcceptedManuscripts(Conference theConference)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that have final status of APPROVED.
      static AccessLevel ConferenceControl.getAccessLevel(Conference theConference, User theUser)
      Use this method to retrieve the AccessLevel of a user for the conference.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getManuscripts(Conference theConference, User theUser)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that this user has 'access' to.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getManuscripts(Conference theConference, User theUser, AccessLevel theAccessLevel)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference for this user and AccessLevel.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getUnassignedSPC(Conference theConference)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference with SPC field marked as NULL.
      static java.lang.String ConferenceControl.updateConference(Conference theConference)
      Use this method to update a conference in the database after one of it's fields has been changed.
